channel.title: CVE Feed for Smartypants -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Smartypants -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38315|2024-09-16T19:41:15.436Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager WordPress plugin is vulnerable to attribute-based Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the from and to parameters in the ~/functions.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 4.25.

item.title: CVE-2024-37224|2024-08-02T03:50:56.059Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in smartypants SP Project & Document Manager.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager: from n/a through 4.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-32551|2024-08-02T02:13:39.907Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Smartypants SP Project & Document Manager.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager : from n/a through 4.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-32551|2024-07-30T15:47:21.074Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Smartypants SP Project & Document Manager.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager : from n/a through 4.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-37224|2024-07-10T21:18:46.654Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Smartypants SP Project & Document Manager allows Path Traversal.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager: from n/a through 4.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-1693|2024-06-04T17:59:27.672Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the cdm_save_category AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 4.70. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update arbitrary folder name that do not belong to them.

item.title: CVE-2024-32551|2024-04-18T10:27:00.687Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Smartypants SP Project & Document Manager.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager : from n/a through 4.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-33923|2024-06-04T17:43:43.551Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Smartypants SP Project & Document Manager.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager : from n/a through 4.69.

item.title: CVE-2024-37224|2024-07-09T09:59:19.624Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Smartypants SP Project & Document Manager allows Path Traversal.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager: from n/a through 4.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-37224|2024-07-22T10:16:33.072Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in smartypants SP Project & Document Manager.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager: from n/a through 4.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-1693|2024-08-01T18:48:21.928Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: The SP Project & Document Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the cdm_save_category AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 4.70. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update arbitrary folder name that do not belong to them.

item.title: CVE-2024-33923|2024-08-02T02:42:59.788Z -- smartypants -- sp%20project%20%26%20document%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Smartypants SP Project & Document Manager.This issue affects SP Project & Document Manager : from n/a through 4.69.
